meta.note: Manage all pages on your website. Each page can contain multiple content blocks that you can arrange and customize.
Junction table connecting pages to content blocks. This is used for the Many-to-Any (M2A) relationship between pages and blocks.
Hero section with headline, description, and call-to-action buttons. Used at the top of pages.
About Us section with headline, subtitle, paragraphs, and image.
Why Choose Us section with title, subtitle, and 4 key points.
Team section displaying dentists with photos, names, and specialties.
External URL fallback if photo not uploaded
Signature treatment section with steps, stats, price, and before/after images.
Safety protocols banner with title, subtitle, and safety points.
Services grid section with title, subtitle, and list of services with icons.
Locations section with branch information, address, hours, phone, and map.
Booking section with contact information and appointment form details.
Contact section with HQ address, phone, hours, and email information.
Features section with title and description.
Testimonials section with title and description.
Pricing section with title and description.
Footer content with links, social media, and copyright information.
Site navigation menu items with hierarchical structure.
Blog post categories for organizing articles.
Blog posts and articles. Write content to educate visitors and improve SEO.
Manage your service offerings. Each service can be categorized and linked to locations and dentists.
Organize your services into categories. Categories help visitors find related services easily.
Site-wide settings that affect your entire website. This is a single record - edit it to update global information.
